column4: Hi everyone, I got a problem with watching videos, screen is black but I can hear the audio, I can only see parts of the video when I open dropdown menu in the player, when I open new window over the player I can see the video like on this screen shot http://imagebin.org/167757 This happens with every player, anyone knows how to fix this?
could be realted to some compositing stuff of your window manager, which one are you using unity?
hmm maybe try diffrent outputs with mplayers -vo option to see if its happens with everyone
i would still recommend trying diffrent video outputs maybe you find one which works
xvidix,xv,opengl,sdl to start with all of the x ones if you have no luck
Note that I watched videos earlier today, not sure whats wrong...
which player did you use? mplayer? maybe mplayers console output can give you some hint
try running mplayer from the console and see what the output tells you maybe you find something useful
you need to replace <videofile> with the filename and location of the videpo you want to play of course
why not? maybe you need to close the player beforehand
